name: Super Dungeon Explorer
description:
Made for RedEye's 2018 weekend hack-day. Hacked  together using Craftyjs. 

Explore the procedural generated dungeons in search of Branye's mythical beard oil.  The elusive beard oil is believed to give immortality. All items in each level are randomly placed.

To start the game click "Run" game then click in the game window, then press enter.

Credit to Rachel Gregory, Brandon Conley, Adam Davis.

Controls

Arrow keys, or WASD . Press spacebar for swipe with sword. Works best in Chrome. To open doors walk towards them and press spacebar.

Git repo: https://github.com/webmull/redeyehackday-2018

- Warning still Buggy!
